metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10722 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: partclone.fat in Partclone before 0.2.88 is prone to a heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability due to insufficient validation of the FAT superblock, related to the mark_reserved_sectors function. An attacker may be able to execute arbitrary code in the context of the user running the affected application.

criterions.comment: partclone: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
